content.rendered:
SALES SPECIALIST

Cherokee Dock

Kelly is originally from New England but grew up in Jacksonville, Florida. Her mom always jokes that she started training Kelly for the event industry from day one, as she was working with Martha Stewart when she was born. Kelly grew up helping with catering and private events, which developed into a love of celebrations both big and small.

After spending a decade in the technology sector, Kelly re-entered the hospitality industry about seven years ago after relocating to Nashville. She’d had the opportunity to work on some great events over the years, but her favorites are always the ones where she’s able to put her skills to use helping family and friends with their own celebrations! 

In her free time, Kelly Ioves being creative; home decor projects and collage art are two of her favorite artistic outlets. She started taking figure skating lessons a few years ago and is still trying to convince her husband it would be fun to start a pairs team! They reside in The Nations with their cat Lucy and love being able to walk to some of their favorite spots in the neighborhood.
